error.signature: ERROR: Package 'package' requires a different Python version: 3.8 not in '>=3.9'

verdict.summary: Package requires a newer Python version than what's currently running.

dead_ends.why_fails: Package may use syntax/features not available in your Python; crashes at runtime

dead_ends.action: Editing the package's metadata to remove the constraint
dead_ends.why_fails: Will be overwritten on next install; doesn't fix actual incompatibilities

workarounds.action: Upgrade Python to the required version or use pyenv to manage versions
Use an older version of the package that supports your Python: pip install 'package<2.0'
workarounds.how: Check the package's changelog for the last version supporting your Python
